item.title: BED BATH BEYOND INC 10-K
item.description: BED BATH BEYOND INC, which is in the Retail-Home Furniture, Furnishings & Equipment Stores [5700] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 22, 2021 had 30805 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 468 instances 2020 - 389 instances million - 373 instances fiscal - 340 instances february - 241 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
